\documentclass[letterpaper,11pt]{report}
\usepackage{color}
\definecolor{Blue}{rgb}{0.3,0.3,0.9}
\definecolor{DarkGreen}{blue!20!black!30!green}
\begin{document}

{\textcolor{Blue}{foo}}
{\textcolor{DarkGreen}{foo}}

Here's a cool site you should check out:
{\color{red}{http://www.devdaily.com/}}
{\color{Blue}{http://www.devdaily.com/}}
{\color[rgb]{1,0.5,0}{http://www.devdaily.com/}}

\end{document}
